dict.acceptation: 父亲（或母亲）；先辈；根源，起源；保护者；

sent.orig: The curriculum was evaluated using observation, semi-structured parent interviews, systematic parent feedback, and researcher-teacher field notes.
sent.trans: 课程之评鉴包括观察表、半结构式父母访谈、系统的父母回馈表和研究者之教学日志。

sent.orig: The child lulled the parent, as the parent had erst lulled the child.
sent.trans: 孩子在哄母亲，正象刚才母亲在哄孩子一样。

sent.orig: Don't put parent directory if you select a parent model.
sent.trans: 如果您选择了一个上级模型的话不要填写上级目录。

sent.orig: It uses yuqing of autocopulation non-compatible system as parent with other parent to cultivate hybrid.
sent.trans: 本发明采用自交不亲和系玉青作亲本同其它亲本杂交育成杂交种。

sent.orig: Please find in your children's homework package a page that lists Class Parent and Parent-on-Duty responsibilities.
sent.trans: 中本周再您子女中文功课里面，请阅读班级家长代表及值日家长职责单，签字后请随子女功课交回。
